| description    = What follows is an initiate's primer in the Four Forms of watershaping, which comprise the basic lessons of our guild: Grief, Hope, Metamorphosis, and Transcendence.

The Form of Grief - Acceptance that one's physicality is not as mutable as water.

The Form of Hope - Understanding that water is more relentless and inexorable than any natural force.

The Form of Metamorphosis - Realization that the body's internal water can help to mediate the prior forms.

The Form of Transcendence - Water covers Eora. If water can be shaped, so can the world.
